amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to increasing access to higher education for low-income Americans through the Federal Pell Grant program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 810 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 810 proposed by Senator Collins. (consideration: CR S1969-1970, S1987-1988; text: CR S1969) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to increasing access to higher education for low-income Americans through the Federal Pell Grant program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 810 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 810 proposed by Senator Collins.
